location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 72 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter regarding a despatch received from Lieutenant Colonel John Macdonald which contained a Firman from His Persian Majesty (Fath ʻAlī Shāh) to His Royal Highness the Governor of Fars (Ḥosayn-‘Alī Mīrzā) on the subject of communications received by Colonel Stannus from the Government discussing the rupture between the Imam of Muscat (Saʻīd bin Sulṭān) and Shaik Abdool Russool Khan [‘Abd al-Rasūl Khān].The letter also refers to enclosed copies of the correspondence referred to in the Firman (which are no longer enclosed); and expresses Colonel Stannus's hope that correspondence from the Government of Shiraz will be more regulated in future.
